keyEvents.title: Rescue Attempt for Luffy
keyEvents.description: Genzo and Nojiko sneak into Arlong Park to save the drowning Luffy while the battles rage on.
keyEvents.significance: The park becomes a battleground where villagers and pirates work together against Arlong's forces.

keyEvents.title: Zoro vs Hatchan Battle
keyEvents.description: The courtyard of Arlong Park serves as the arena for Zoro's battle with the six-sword wielding Hatchan.
keyEvents.significance: Site of the first major victory for the Straw Hats against the Arlong Pirates' officers.

keyEvents.title: Underwater Battle Begins
keyEvents.description: The pool area of Arlong Park becomes the battleground for Sanji's challenging underwater fight with Kuroobi.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the strategic design of Arlong Park with underwater areas that favor fish-men.

description: Arlong Park is the headquarters of the Arlong Pirates, featuring both above-water and underwater areas designed to give fish-men tactical advantages. The structure includes a large pool where Luffy is trapped and multiple courtyard areas for battles.

keyEvents.title: Nami Prepares to Return
keyEvents.description: Nami bandages her wounds at her house in Cocoyasi Village and decides to return to Arlong Park to fight.
keyEvents.significance: Marks the location where Nami makes her final decision to fully commit to fighting alongside the Straw Hats.

description: Cocoyasi Village is Nami's home village in the Conomi Islands, where she and Nojiko were raised by Bell-mère. The village has been under Arlong's oppressive rule for eight years.
